name: Pie Pets
description:
Welcome to Pie Pets! This game is a submission for the Secret Santa 2022 Game Jam! My giftee for the jam is into idle clicker games and virtual pet games.

Pie pets is an idle clicker game where you collect pies and purchase pets to help automatically collect you pies over time! Collect more pies, and evolve your pets while also making sure to keep your pets fed!

Can you collect and evolve all the pets?

Credits:

Landscape art - North Game Studio

Pet art - Kacper Woźniak

Font - Seba Perez

Music - Pix
